title: Video: Fall Out Boy – My Songs Know What You Did In The Dark (Light Em Up)
content:
Years of will they/won’t they debate and forums overflowing with rumours were finally silenced this week by the unexpected return of one of the finest bands to ever walk the earth.

No, not My Bloody Valentine, but the other group who soundtracked much of my teenage years – Fall Out Boy. Several years out has clearly done nothing to harm their songwriting ability, as shown on new track My Songs Know What You Did In The Dark (Light Em Up), a festival anthem in waiting. Scrawl the lyrics onto your binders, grow your fringe and borrow your mom’s eyeliner. Fall Out Boy are back.

Check out the new single below, as well as plethora of live dates in support of their upcoming LP Save Rock and Rollout 6 May.

when we were kids the only thing that got us through most days was music. its why we started fall out boy in the first place. this isn’t a reunion because we never broke up. we needed to plug back in and make some music that matters to us.

the future of fall out boy starts now.

save rock and roll…
